price: Ka ce: "Shin, in gaya muku mafi sharri daga wannan, dõmin sakamako* daga wurin Allah? wanda Allah Ya la'ane shi kuma Ya yi fushi da shi, kuma Ya sanya daga gare su birai da aladai, kuma ya bauta wa ¦ãguta. Waɗannan ne mafiya sharrin wuri, kuma mafiya ɓata daga tsakar hanya."
arabic: قُلۡ هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُم بِشَرّٖ مِّن ذَٰلِكَ مَثُوبَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ مَن لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُ وَغَضِبَ عَلَيۡهِ وَجَعَلَ مِنۡهُمُ ٱلۡقِرَدَةَ وَٱلۡخَنَازِيرَ وَعَبَدَ ٱلطَّٰغُوتَۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗا وَأَضَلُّ عَن سَوَآءِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
footnotes: * Kunã son in gaya muku ba dõmin ku bã ni wani sakamako ba, sai dõmin Allah Ya sãkã mini. Mutãnen da aka jũyar suka kõma birai da aladai kuma suka bauta wa wanin Allah, su ne mafi sharrin mutãne.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul hal unabbi-ukum bisharrin min dhālika mathūbatan ʿinda al-lahi man laʿanahu al-lahu waghaḍiba ʿalayhi wajaʿala min'humu al-qiradata wal-khanāzīra waʿabada al-ṭāghūta ulāika sharrun makānan wa-aḍallu ʿan sawāi al-sabīli
